name: NovelASPect
overview:
NovelASPect specializes in Accounting Application Hosting utilizing Citrix technology.

Hosted applications include all full-featured versions of Intuit’s QuickBooksÂ®, Peachtree, and Microsoft Office, Microsoft Small Business, MYOB, LaCerte, ProSystems, ProSeries, Quicken, & Microsoft Money.

Accountants and small businesses have the opportunity to partner with NovelASPect through its Value Added Reseller Program (VAR) program. This flexible, integrated partnership approach- (rather than the standard commission-based approach) facilitates joint marketing efforts, integrated offerings, and more. VAR participants can bill their clients whatever they wish and maximize profits.

NovelASPect is a privately owned corporation headquartered in Silicon Valley.

milestones.description: NovelAspect merged with CloudAspects and added Warren Patterson as their COO.  The combined companies now offer a long list of hosted applications for SMB's including Quickbooks, PeachTree and Calyx
